He spawns Spirit Animals that you must",3:"§7kill to spawn a Spirit Bear which when killed drops the Spirit",4:"§7Bow which is a single shot bow and the only was to damage him."],Name:"§6Thorn (Boss)"},ExtraAttributes:{id:"THORN_BOSS"}}
lore: §7Thorn is the boss of Floor 4 of the Catacombs. He is a
§7'Shaman Necromancer', appears as a ghast, and does not
§7attack the player. He spawns Spirit Animals that you must
§7kill to spawn a Spirit Bear which when killed drops the Spirit
§7Bow which is a single shot bow and the only was to damage him.
